notes.text: You can now use separators for grouped actions
We now determine the table type based on the service definition
We now provide the preferredAction startup parameter to automatically trigger the SmartSummary action on the object page
We now use the OperationAvailable annotation to check if a user has the required permission to edit a collaborative draft
We now terminate ABAP draft sessions when users move away from the draft
You can now use the colorPalette property in the Status building block
We now provide an API on the Table building block to select contexts or clear the selection
You can now use semantically connected fields in tables
You can now use the WebSocketBaseURL annotation with a relative path
We now exclude hidden properties in an analytical table when using the Export feature in split mode
